sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"阻止，抑制，制止"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: restrain, check, refrain, bridle, curb, inhibit
means: restrain ： 含义广，指用强力或权力去阻止或限制某人做某事。
check ： 多指阻止前进或继续发展。
refrain ： 常指暂时对某种行动或冲动的抑制。
bridle ： 指抑制住强烈的感情或欲望。
curb ： 可指急剧或果断的制止，也可指用严格的方法加以控制。
inhibit ： 主要指抑制愿望、情绪或念头，也指制止某物的蔓延。

list.explanation: (表示同意、 理解等的感叹语)

entry.def: If you check something such as a piece of information or a document, you make sure that it is correct or satisfactory.

example.ex: Check the accuracy of everything in your CV...
example.tran: 请核对简历中的每个细节，务必准确无误。

example.ex: It's worth checking each item for obvious flaws...
example.tran: 有必要逐件检查一下是否有明显的瑕疵。

entry.def: If you check on someone or something, you make sure they are in a safe or satisfactory condition.
entry.tran: 检查，查看(以确保一切正常)

example.ex: Stephen checked on her several times during the night...
example.tran: 斯蒂芬夜里起来看了她好几遍。

example.ex: He decided to check on things at the warehouse.
example.tran: 他决定去仓库查看一下。

entry.def: If you check something that is written on a piece of paper, you put a mark, like a V with the right side extended, next to it to show that something is correct or has been selected or dealt with.
entry.tran: 在…上打钩（以确定其正确、已选定或已处理）

example.ex: Frequently, men who check answer (b) have not actually had the experience of being repeatedly rejected by women.
example.tran: 多数情况下，选(b)的男人没有真的尝过三番五次被女人拒绝的滋味。

entry.def: To check something, usually something bad, means to stop it from spreading or continuing.

example.ex: Sex education is also expected to help check the spread of AIDS.
example.tran: 人们还希望性教育有助于控制艾滋病的蔓延。

example.ex: ...free press that will check corruption by ensuring total transparency in government.
example.tran: 通过确保政府行政完全透明来抑制腐败的新闻自由

entry.def: If you check yourself or if something checks you, you suddenly stop what you are doing or saying.

example.ex: He was about to lose his temper but checked himself in time...
example.tran: 他刚要发火，不过又及时克制住了。

example.ex: I held up one finger to check him.
example.tran: 我竖起一根手指头制止了他。

entry.def: When you check your luggage at an airport, you give it to an official so that it can be taken on to your plane.

example.ex: We arrived at the airport, checked our baggage and wandered around the gift shops...
example.tran: 我们到了机场，托运了行李，到礼品店里逛了逛。

example.ex: You can check your baggage right through to its final destination.
example.tran: 你可以把行李直接托运到终点。

entry.def: The check in a restaurant is a piece of paper on which the price of your meal is written and which you are given before you pay.
In a game of chess, you say check when you are attacking your opponent's king.
A pattern of squares, usually of two colours, can be referred to as checks or a check .
entry.tran: (通常为两种颜色的)方格图案，格子图案

example.tran: 款式包括条纹的和格子的。
红白相间的格子连衣裙

entry.def: If something or someone is held in check or is kept in check, they are controlled and prevented from becoming too great or powerful.
entry.tran: 受到控制的；被控制住的

example.ex: Life on Earth will become unsustainable unless population growth is held in check...
example.tran: 人口增长要是不加控制的话，地球上的生命将无法持续发展。

example.ex: He's found someone with a bit of fight to keep him in check.
example.tran: 他发现有个厉害的主儿能镇住他了。

entry.def: A check is the same as a cheque .

means.word_mean: 1. a written order directing a bank to pay money;

sentences.sentence: "he paid all his bills by check"

means.word_mean: 2. an appraisal of the state of affairs;

sentences.sentence: "they made an assay of the contents"
"a check on its dependability under stress"

means.word_mean: 3. the bill in a restaurant;

sentences.sentence: "he asked the waiter for the check"

means.word_mean: 4. the state of inactivity following an interruption;

sentences.sentence: "during the halt he got some lunch"
"the momentary stay enabled him to escape the blow"
"he spent the entire stop in his seat"

means.word_mean: 5. additional proof that something that was believed (some fact or hypothesis or theory) is correct;

sentences.sentence: "fossils provided further confirmation of the evolutionary theory"

means.word_mean: 6. the act of inspecting or verifying;

sentences.sentence: "they made a check of their equipment"
"the pilot ran through the check-out procedure"

means.word_mean: 7. a mark indicating that something has been noted or completed etc.;

sentences.sentence: "as he called the role he put a check mark by each student's name"

means.word_mean: 8. something immaterial that interferes with or delays action or progress
9. a mark left after a small piece has been chopped or broken off of something
10. a textile pattern of squares or crossed lines (resembling a checkerboard);
11. the act of restraining power or action or limiting excess;

sentences.sentence: "his common sense is a bridle to his quick temper"

means.word_mean: 12. obstructing an opponent in ice hockey
13. (chess) a direct attack on an opponent's king
1. examine so as to determine accuracy, quality, or condition;
2. make an examination or investigation;
3. be careful or certain to do something; make certain of something;

sentences.sentence: "He verified that the valves were closed"

means.word_mean: 4. lessen the intensity of; temper; hold in restraint; hold or keep within limits;
5. stop for a moment, as if out of uncertainty or caution;

sentences.sentence: "She checked for an instant and missed a step"

means.word_mean: 6. put a check mark on or next to;

sentences.sentence: "Please check each name on the list"

means.word_mean: 7. slow the growth or development of;

sentences.sentence: "The brain damage will retard the child's language development"

means.word_mean: 8. be verified or confirmed; pass inspection;
9. be compatible, similar or consistent; coincide in their characteristics;

sentences.sentence: "The two stories don't agree in many details"
"The handwriting checks with the signature on the check"
"The suspect's fingerprints don't match those on the gun"

means.word_mean: 10. block or impede (a player from the opposing team) in ice hockey
11. train by instruction and practice; especially to teach self-control;
12. consign for shipment on a vehicle;
13. hand over something to somebody as for temporary safekeeping;
14. abandon the intended prey, turn, and pursue an inferior prey, of falcons

17. decline to initiate betting
18. hold back, as of a danger or an enemy; check the expansion or influence of;

sentences.sentence: "Check the growth of communism in Sout East Asia"

means.word_mean: 19. place into check;
20. write out a check on a bank account
21. find out, learn, or determine with certainty, usually by making an inquiry or other effort;

sentences.sentence: "I want to see whether she speaks French"
"Check whether the train leaves on time"

means.word_mean: 22. verify by consulting a source or authority;
23. arrest the motion (of something) abruptly;

sentences.sentence: "He checked the flow of water by shutting off the main valve"

means.word_mean: 24. make cracks or chinks in;
25. become fractured; break or crack on the surface only;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally as used in the game of chess): the noun and exclamation from Old French eschec, from medieval Latin scaccus, via Arabic from Persian šāh 'king'; the verb from Old French eschequier 'play chess, put in check'. The sense 'stop, restrain, or control' arose from the use in chess, and led (in the late 17th cent.) to 'examine the accuracy of, verify'
late Middle English: probably from chequer

sentences.cn: 请核实一下名单上的每一个名字.
sentences.en: Please check each name on the list.

sentences.cn: 我们会核实我们的保险项目.
sentences.en: I will check our Insurance cover.

sentences.cn: 可否将此特殊重要事项与中方测试公司核实一下?
sentences.en: Can you check this top important point with the testing Company in China?

sentences.cn: 银行必须要先核实您的身份然后再为您兑现支票.
sentences.en: The bank has to verify your identity before you cash your check.

sentences.cn: 他在和肖杨最后一次核实旅馆订房的问题.
sentences.en: He and Xiao Yang are having a final check about the reservation.

sentences.cn: 含蓄的感情模式需要时间和勇气来核实新的信息.
sentences.en: Introverted Feeling types need time and encouragement to check new information anyinconsistencies they find.

sentences.cn: 但我们实际上可以核实的信息只有最后那个邮箱地址.
sentences.en: The only one we can realistically check is the last.

sentences.cn: 最后周先生同意了, 但为了安全起见他核实了女方的身份背景.
sentences.en: The Zhous agreed, but took the precaution of running a quick background check.

sentences.cn: 关于您的汽车保险,我要做一些核实.
sentences.en: I wanted to check some things regarding your car insurance.

sentences.cn: 帐单算错了, 我们得叫服务员核实一下.
sentences.en: The bill is wrong, and we have to ask the waiter to check it.

sentences.cn: 我只需检查核实一旦产品投产, 一切有关事宜都符合规章制度.
sentences.en: I just have to check thatit goes into production, everything about it with all the rules.

sentences.cn: 门房不能给检查核对的人员力所能及的帮助.
sentences.en: The concierge was available but not helping as he could have with check in's.

sentences.cn: 欲知详情, 查核举报箱以下的资源.
sentences.en: For details, check the URL in the resource box below.

sentences.cn: 对可能的录用人选进行参考资料查核, 并取得应徵者之授权书.
sentences.en: Get the applicant's written authorization for reference checks , and carefully check references.

sentences.cn: 同意主办方有权查核及核实所提供的资料.
sentences.en: Agree that the organizer is authorized to check and verify the information provided.

sentences.cn: 请查核并尽快重新接通电话线为荷.
sentences.en: Kindly check into it and reconnect the line as soon as possible.

sentences.cn: 如未收到, 必须于4月4日前联络本会,以便查核报名资料.
sentences.en: If not, they should contact HKAAA before 4 April to check their entries.

sentences.cn: 请你再查核一下好 吗 ?
sentences.en: Could you check it again, please ?

sentences.cn: 强烈建议让您的应用程序显式地检查与请求中止有关的所有输入.
sentences.en: It is strongly recommended that your application explicitly check all input regarding request aborts.

sentences.cn: 如果已婚,请在方块内打勾.
sentences.en: Please check here if you are married.

sentences.cn: 工作人员: 请分别在医疗福利和族裔的对应方格里打勾. 您是华裔 吗 ?
sentences.en: Agent: Please check the appropriate boxes for medical benefits and your ethnic group. Are you Chinese?

sentences.cn: 如您是博鳌亚洲论坛会员,享受免费参会名额或优惠价,请在相应方框里打勾.
sentences.en: Please check the box below if you qualify for complimentary registration or discount for BFA Members.

sentences.cn: 请列出学生的兄弟姐妹以及他们所上的学校.如果他们也正在树人学校学习,请打勾.
sentences.en: List all siblings and the schools they attended. Please check if they also applying to SRS.

sentences.cn: 每一张旅行支票都有特定的号码.
sentences.en: Every traveler check has its individual number.

sentences.cn: 过了不久,我收到一张两分钱的支票,作为交还设备的报酬!
sentences.en: Then I got a refund check of $ . 02 for the returned equipment!

sentences.cn: 是的,我想存这张支票上的钱, 共350元.
sentences.en: B : Yes. I'd like to deposit this check, that's 350 dollars.

sentences.cn: 你能为我兑现这张支票 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can you cash this check for me?

sentences.cn: 我要在这张旅行支票做第二次签字 吗 ?
sentences.en: Shall I countersign this traveler's check?

sentences.cn: 他说他受指示从这家公司开张支票给我.
sentences.en: He said he was instructed to cut a check to me from this company.

sentences.cn: 请在支票背面写上你的帐号.
sentences.en: Please write your account number on the back of the check.

sentences.cn: 出纳员不会给未获批准的支票兑付现金.
sentences.en: The cashier would not cash the check without an endorsement.

sentences.cn: 劳驾, 请给我兑现这张支票好 吗 ?
sentences.en: Excuse me, could you please cash this check for me?

sentences.cn: 他开了一张支票给他的母亲, 但是支票被退票了.
sentences.en: He wrote his mother a check, but the check was bounced.

sentences.cn: 我们早上要做的第一件事 就是 给你寄支票.
sentences.en: We'll mail you a check the first thing in the morning.

sentences.cn: 店主: ( 愤怒地 ) 我要你的钱, 不是这张假的支票!
sentences.en: Host: ( angrily ) I want your money, not this fake check!

sentences.cn: 他无法给朋友买礼物, 商店不承认他的支票.
sentences.en: He could not buy the gift for his friend. The store would not honour his check.

sentences.cn: 他给她一张100镑的支票以赔偿她丢失的项链.
sentences.en: He tendered a check for 100 pounds for her lost necklace.

sentences.cn: 我想将这张支票兑现.
sentences.en: I'd like to have this check cashed.

sentences.cn: 呈交财务经理之前,核对供货商提供的发票和发出的支票是否一致.
sentences.en: Match official receipts from supplier with issued check before passing to Finance manager.

sentences.cn: 请在支票后面签名.
sentences.en: Please endorse the check on the back.

sentences.cn: 你用支票还是现金?
sentences.en: Did you pay by check or cash?

sentences.cn: 你在这张支票上漏写了日期.
sentences.en: You have omitted the date from this check.

sentences.cn: 好了.现在清楚了. 你的支票是对的. 只付了一个星期的工资.
sentences.en: Is it ? Well , let me have a look at your check and your pay stub, please.

sentences.cn: 她一没钱了就写信给她的父亲,于是他就给她寄一张支票.
sentences.en: Whenever she was tight spot, she'd write to her father and he'd send her a check.

sentences.cn: 请将这张支票兑换成现金.
sentences.en: I'd like to cash this check in, please.

sentences.cn: 若现金股利汇款无法入帐, 本公司将改以邮寄支票方式发放.
sentences.en: If the cash dividend remittance fails, we will mail the check to shareholders instead.

sentences.cn: 这些保险债券已经到期了,供应商应该马上发行一张支票.
sentences.en: These insurance bonds have matured and the provider should issue a check immediately.

sentences.cn: 我给他开个支票吧, 韦佛先生?
sentences.en: Shall I make out a check, Mr. Weaver?

sentences.cn: 用银行支票汇钱现在很普遍.
sentences.en: The transfer of money by bank check is very common today.

sentences.cn: 请在支票背面签上你的名字.
sentences.en: Please sign your name on the back of the check.

sentences.cn: 那张支票已经被注销了,新的一张已经发出了.
sentences.en: That check canceled and a new one was issued.

sentences.cn: 那么我怎样将这张支票兑现 呢 ?
sentences.en: How do I cash this check then?

sentences.cn: 希望贵方收到此催告信后, 以最方便的方式, 惠寄支票为荷.
sentences.en: We hope with this reminder, however , that you will find it convenient to send your check.

sentences.cn: 检验容器是否有裂缝或者漏的地方。
sentences.en: Check the container for cracks or leaks.

sentences.cn: 不要让程序员检验自己的事产品, 程序员会无视自己犯的不对.
sentences.en: Don't let your programs check their own work; they'll miss their own errors.

sentences.cn: 为了检验某些标准的可靠性,进行了一次实验.
sentences.en: An experiment was carried out to check up on the reliability of certain criteria.

sentences.cn: 等价性检验方法通常包括功能性和结构性的验证方法.
sentences.en: The equivalence check usually includes both functional and structural verifications.

sentences.cn: 她的申辩经不起检验,这一点已经越来越明显了.
sentences.en: It was increasingly obvious her alibi didn't check out.

sentences.cn: 在模数检验法中, 一个和数用某个数来除,其中的除数称为模数.
sentences.en: In a modulo check, the number by which the summed digits are divided.

sentences.cn: 奇偶校验用于检验数据的完整性.
sentences.en: Parity is often used to check the integrity of transmitted data.

sentences.cn: 鸡场检验员应该检查生了病的鸡场工作人员抓的鸡.
sentences.en: The chicken checkers ought to check the chickens that the chicken catchers caught.

sentences.cn: 本说明适用于低压开关设备的安装, 安装检验,实地改建等工作.
sentences.en: This manual is only suitable for the installation, check and modification on site.

sentences.cn: 有简单的指令要帮助你搜寻, 检验, 或分类文件的内容.
sentences.en: There are simple commands to help you search, check, or sort the contents of a file.

sentences.cn: 为了检验这一点, 我们把阀值调低.
sentences.en: To check this, we turn down the threshold level.

sentences.cn: 现在检验和屏幕边缘还有挡板的碰撞是否是期望的那样.
sentences.en: Here you check if the collisions happen with the screen borders and paddle as expected.

sentences.cn: 我们要按照部标来检验自己的产品.
sentences.en: We check our products according to the standards made by the Ministries.

sentences.cn: 不像光学系统, 声学检验系统会使车上的乘客感到相当厌烦.
sentences.en: Unlike optical systems, acoustic check systems can bother the passengers of a vehicle a lot.

sentences.cn: 请你在检验单上签个字.
sentences.en: Please sign your name to the check list.

sentences.cn: 在把血汗钱投向昂贵的安全产品前, 请检验下列免费工具.
sentences.en: Before you spend your earned money on expensive security products, check out the following free tools.

sentences.cn: 在每次换班前是否用AOI机器检验镀金板?
sentences.en: Is golden boards used to check the AOI machine before the inspection of each shift?

sentences.cn: 按设计的整定值,检验继电器实际动作值.
sentences.en: Check actual operation value of the relay according to set value.

sentences.cn: 收发货并根据包装进行检验.
sentences.en: Receive and deliver goods and check them against the packing list.

sentences.cn: 相关产品电器特性检验要求及标准规划实施及督导.
sentences.en: To carry out and supervise the check standard and the standard programming.

sentences.cn: 检验容器是否有裂缝或者漏的地方。
sentences.en: Check the container for cracks or leaks.

sentences.cn: 根据既定目标检验操作员的效率。
sentences.en: Check the operator'sproductivity against agreed targets.

Sentence.sentence: One simple check would be to program a robot to check the correct course of action with a human when presented with an unusual situation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Check with your school’s career service or employment office for help to find a campus job.

Sentence.sentence: Make sure you check  in with your opponents so that they are not carrying the emotion of the battles beyond the battlefield.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Of course, I didn’t know she couldn’t read, so there I was submitting thesereports, he said, She would put check marks on them like she hadbeen reading them.

Sentence.sentence: RelayRides and SnapGoods match up owners and renters; smartphones with GPS let people see where the nearest rentable car is parked; social networks provide a way to check up on people and build trust; and online payment systems handle the billing
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: By using Facebook and other social networks, participants can check each other out and identify friends ( or friends of friends) in common
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: As well as the background checks carried out by platform owners, online reviews and ratings are usually posted by both parties to each transaction, which makes it easy to spot bad drivers, bathrobe-thieves and surfboard-wreckers
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Excuses can get very elaborate: "I know I'm look at another's exam, even though I'm supposed to keep my eyes on my own paper, but that's not cheating because I'm just checking my answers, not copying.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Heidrich now visits websites that discuss gaming addiction regularly "to remind myself to keep my love for online games in check.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They're online in chat rooms, checking e-mail, or writing blogs.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Yeah, but that only leaves me 30 minutes to clear customs in getting to the city center and (13) it means I have to check in by 5:30, which means leaving home at about 4:
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The video machine has to be checked.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But check out the cost if renting an apartment first.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "Of course, I didn't know she couldn't read, so there I was submitting these reports," he said, "She would put check marks on them like she had been reading them.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Check with your school's career service or employment office for help to find a campus job.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Let me check who would be living with you in your flat.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Make sure you check in with your opponents so that they are not carrying the emotion of the battles beyond the battlefield .
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Some eyewitnesses report that a bag was about to be loaded on board, but it exploded during a security check.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: That's the vision of a hotel chain that plans to send digital keys to guests' phones via an app instead of making them check in and get the traditional plastic swipe cards.
